cards.claim: Management raised long-term output guidance, supporting near-term growth [ref:section:Per-Year Detail]

quotes.text: We plan to expand capacity by 20% over the next two years.

cards.rationale: Capacity expansion can lift growth and alter capital intensity.

cards.claim: Tariffs could pressure near-term margins [ref:section:Terminal Value]

quotes.text: Proposed import tariffs on key components.

cards.rationale: Tariffs typically compress gross margin until pricing adjusts.
